text: Brandon Facyson (born September 8, 1994) is an American football cornerback for the Los Angeles Chargers of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Virginia Tech == Professional career == Facyson signed with the Chargers as an undrafted free agent in 2018. Facyson finished his rookie season with 3 tackles, playing in 15 games as well as both playoff games for the Chargers.http://www.nfl.com/player/brandonfacyson/2560719/gamelogs?season=2018 In Facyson's second season he made his first professional start in a Week 2 loss to the Lions.http://www.nfl.com/player/brandonfacyson/2560719/gamelogs?season=2019 Facyson finished his second season starting 4 games, playing in all 16, and recording 41 tackles. ==References== ==External links== *Los Angeles Chargers bio Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Jacksonville, Florida Category:Players of American football from Florida Category:American football cornerbacks Category:Virginia Tech Hokies football players Category:Los Angeles Chargers players
title: Brandon Facyson
